fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Enevate BV is currently following the process regarding EU Innovation Fund. While the Innovation Fund can in principle finance Airborne Wind Energy (AWE) projects already according to the current draft plans, since “Next generation wind turbines” are included as eligible technology, we would like to try to bring more emphasis on AWE as a key breakthrough renewable energy technology.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Enevate BV develops the next generation of wind energy systems in the field of Airborne Wind Energy.  
 
Airborne Wind Energy allows to access winds in higher altitudes while using significantly less material than conventional solutions currently available. This opens up new geographical markets for wind energy to contribute to the global energy mix.
